Name: RUST
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install RUST and run it.

UDP.Name: UDP
UDP.Description: UDP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...)

Steam-Username.Name: Steam-Username
Steam-Username.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Validate Installation.Name: Validate Installation
Validate Installation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Steam-Password.Name: Steam-Password
Steam-Password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Game Parameters.Name: Game Parameters
Game Parameters.Description: Enter here your extra game startup parameters if needed starting with (eg: '+rcon.port 27016 +rcon.password YOURPASSWORD' don't forget to add also a new port here on the template page with container and host port set to the corresponding RCON port)

GAME_ID.Name: GAME_ID
GAME_ID.Description: The GAME_ID that the container downloads at startup. If you want to use a beta version of the game enter this: '258550 -beta staging' or '258550 -beta prerelease' (without quotes).

Server Name.Name: Server Name
Server Name.Description: Name of the Server goes here

Enable Oxide Mod.Name: Enable Oxide Mod
Enable Oxide Mod.Description: Set to 'true' (without quotes) to enable Oxide Mod, otherwise leave empty (the container will check on every start/restart if there is a newer version available).

GAME_PORT.Name: GAME_PORT
GAME_PORT.Description: Game port on which the server is running (has to match the port mapping in your container).
